title: Saga 001-003 (2012) (Digital-1920) (Zone-Empire)
description:
NOTE: Now, this one, you really should download, unless you already got these re-releases via the December Hitlists. Fiona Staples's artwork, being definitely on the intricate side of things, quite simply demands the Hi-Res treatment it gets here! :)
